Sorry, if it has Cinavia, there is nothing you can do to stream it onto your ps3, unless you buy a cracked ps3.

For the Cinavia issue on PS3,someone gave this workaround I haven't tested:
-settings
-sound settings
-audio output settings
-optical digital-tick all sounds
-save
-go to audio multi out and turn on

Native media player on PS3 sucks ... too many restrictions and limitations ... Jailbreak your PS3 with 3.55 CFW (I recommend KMEAW) and install and use "Showtime" media player -> https://github.com/andoma/showtime/downloads :)

ok i got this trick for the error that comes up with this for ps3 cinavia...this only works for blue rays not stuff thats in theaters that...trust me it works for me so please leave a comment... so you can play this movie with out error for like 20 or so mins right? go to your date and time and randomly advance the day month year and time then go back and enjoy...rinse and repeat

this only works for the error that mutes the audio which usually comes on blue ray disk and shit not stuff if theaters that stop the all movie a few mins from the start... it does work so try it just advance time!!! tell me how it goes

ok i think my comments got deleted ps3 fix for cinavia blueray only!! not ts or cam!!! really easy just go to your date/time and advance it a few years it should work for awhile then do it again!!1 it works let me know
shadownights23 has this one right... Just change the date forward a year, and repeat ever 30 mins or so... Sounds too easy but give it a try...

First off, I'm an avid expert Torrent user and while I may not leech of society without giving back like most, I am a proficient downloader.  I've NEVER EVER heard of "Cinavia".  I played this crappy substandard .AVI (good GOD that's a sign of why NOT to download this) using WMP and I don't have ANY codecs installed what-so-ever and it plays fine, though crappy picture and audio.  I don't use FFDShow or XVID or DIVX.

If you're not able to access this file then your system is F'ed and you need to fix it.  Cinavia or not.

And stop being putzes!
